title: Bruce Hay Joins As Vice President – Business Development of VDart Inc.
text:
ATLANTA, April 02, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- VDart is proud to announce our newest addition to our team, Bruce Hay as Vice President of Business Development. Bruce joined VDart Inc. in March 2018, bringing several years of global staffing and outsourcing service industry expertise. Prior to joining VDart, Bruce held leadership positions for 13 years in global/national staffing and outsourcing firms. These include Vice President - Business Development at AMN Healthcare, Senior Vice President - Hospitality Staffing Solutions, Vice President - Global Solutions at Kelly Services Outsourcing & Consulting Group, as well as Vice President - Business Development & Solutions Consulting, Vice President - Operations & Product Development, and Business Manager at VOLT. Bruce will be coordinating his efforts in specifically assisting the executive strategy lead by Rohit Bardaiyar - EVP - Strategy & Sales.
Bruce started his career and spent 17 years in leadership, strategy, sales, operations and product management roles, helping make factories, information technology functions and businesses run better through outsourced services at Advanced Technology Services, Inc. (ATS), a spin-off of Caterpillar Inc. (CAT). He has hands-on global workforce solutions experience ranging from Temporary and Permanent Staffing, Managed Service Provider (MSP) Programs, Business Process Outsourcing (BPO), Statement of Work (SOW) projects, Recruiting Process Outsourcing (RPO) and Vendor Management Systems (VMS). These workforce solution designs have helped clients across multiple industries and global geographies improve quality, productivity and profitability. He received his Bachelor of Science, Marketing, at Illinois State University and his Master of Business Administration at the University of Illinois. VDart is excited and encouraged to have Bruce Hay join our journey.
“VDart Inc. is proud to have Bruce join our team,” says Sidd, President and CEO of VDart Inc. “His vast experience in Sales, Strategy and Leadership coupled with his experience as a successful executive in design, management and execution of transformational sales initiatives for major corporations will be of immense value add to VDart’s vision.”
VDart has grown consistently through its deep expertise in fulfilling talent gaps for large Fortune 1000 customers, leading system integrators, and managed service providers. As an organization, it has consistently embraced emerging technologies including Analytics, Cloud, IoT, Cybersecurity, and Artificial Intelligence. Our Digital Staffing expertise help organizations become “intelligent organizations” and create a unique customer experience by providing top notch talent in emerging technologies.
"VDart has an award winning and outstanding brand. The proof is in the results employees deliver daily, which leads to quality brand name clients coming back for more. The culture is inspiring, empowering, partnering, fun and innovating to grow to the next level. I am honored to join the team helping build out the Sales organization, implementing a state-of-the-art CRM technology, developing consultative solution sales processes and more,” Hay says.
About VDart:
VDart Inc. is a Digital Staffing provider based out of Atlanta, Georgia with expertise in staffing Digital & Emerging technology skills. We specialize in providing Fortune 1000 companies, niche hard to find skills in technologies including Social, Mobile, Big Data Analytics, Cloud, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence. We have deep industry expertise and focus in BFSI, Manufacturing, Energy & Utility, Healthcare and Technology domain. With our Core focus in emerging technologies we have provided global technology workforce solutions in USA, Canada, Mexico, Brazil, UK, Australia & India. We take pride in delivering specialized talent, superior performance and seamless execution to meet challenging business needs of customers worldwide. Visit us at www.vdartinc.com
